column4: operations from farm to the buyer Explain product consolidation and product delivery Explain product quality management and the procedures to include but not limited to cleaning, sorting, grading, packing, labeling Explain traceability and the tagging and coding of packaged products for traceability Explain recordkeeping of marketing transactions Sell the consolidated products Discuss assessment process and its importance Explain post-test marketing assessment Discuss contingency planning and corrective actions
